front.title: Media over QUIC Transport (MOQT) for Agent-to-Agent Protocol

abstract.t: This document specifies how the Agent-to-Agent (A2A) protocol can be transported over Media over QUIC Transport (MOQT). MOQT provides a publish/subscribe model over QUIC that enables efficient real-time communication between AI agents, supporting the A2A protocol's requirements for discovery, negotiation, and collaboration while leveraging MOQT's streaming capabilities and built-in prioritization mechanisms.
